TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyTipService extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示一種服務，提供屬性、方法和事件，以啟用和管理在 WPF 控制項中的 KeyTip。

span.span: Represents a service that provides properties, methods, and events to enable and manage KeyTips in WPF controls.
